attributes.action: Abolish the Mayor of London and replace it with a Minister for London.
attributes.additional_details:
The incumbent Mayor has failed time and time again.

The mayor claims to speak on behalf of the entire nation regarding issues like brexit or international leaders, our closest allies.
attributes.background:
Abolish the Mayor for London and replace it with a government Minister for London. 

Youth Homicide up 70%
Rape up 18.3%
Theft Up 33.9%
Knife Crime Up 31.3%
Gun Crime Up 16.3%
In the first nine-and-a-half months as Mayor, he had 4. After saying he'd have “zero strikes” on public transport.

rejection.details:
There's already a Minister for London. We're not sure what you'd like the UK Parliament or Government to do. In particular, we're not sure if you would like the Minister for London to be given the powers that Mayor of London currently has or whether you'd like a different arrangement. 

You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316189

You could also start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take back the powers that currently rest with the Mayor of London and the London Assembly, if that's something you'd like to happen.
